function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High density urban areas facilitating easier transmission of communicable diseases due to increased social contact","Impact":"Rapid and widespread transmission of contagious diseases leading to public health crisis","Mitigation":"Implementing strategies to reduce population density and manage social contact in urban areas","Technologies":"Smart city technologies for managing crowd density and movement","People":"Residents of densely populated urban areas","Owner":"Urban planners and local government"},{"Description":"Inadequate management of multi-functional public spaces leading to increased risk of virus transmission","Impact":"Higher likelihood of virus spread in public spaces and reduced physical activity opportunities","Mitigation":"Implementing proper management and preventive design strategies for public spaces","Technologies":"IoT sensors for monitoring crowd density and air quality in public spaces","People":"Public space users and visitors","Owner":"Urban planners and public space managers"},{"Description":"Overcrowding due to concentration of amenities leading to increased risk of virus transmission","Impact":"Higher chance of virus transmission due to large crowds in limited areas","Mitigation":"Implementing decentralization strategies to distribute amenities and reduce crowd concentration","Technologies":"Smart city technologies for monitoring and managing crowd movement","People":"City residents and visitors","Owner":"Urban planners and local government"}]}
